Key Match Events: Keshav Maharaj defended 10 runs in the last over
Aiden Markram took a stunning running catch at long-on to deny Bangladesh a famous win
Bangladesh were 94 for 4 at the end of 17 overs and needed 20 runs off 18 balls but could not get the death bowling away
Pre-Game Insights: South Africa have never beaten Bangladesh in a T20I
Bangladesh have never beaten South Africa in a T20I
Post-Match Reflections: South Africa have three wins from three games
Bangladesh still have Nepal and Netherlands to play so there's opportunity for them to go through as well
Miscellaneous Highlights: The crowd, meanwhile, is a sea of green and all cheering for Bangladesh
Others: The match was played in New York, USA
